description.en: Then Narasambhaṭṭa, son of Subrahmanya, having been initiated by Gaṅgādhara got the appellation Brahmānandaghana held the preceptor-ship of the Pīṭha for twenty-eight years. This great preceptor merged in the Lord Ăśvara as He ws teaching the disciples the Brahmasūtra, bhāṣya etc. in the early morning of Aṣṭami of Kṛṣṇapakṣā in the month of Kārtika in the year Ăśvara.

shlokas:
subrahmaNyabhavO niyamya narasambhaTTO'tha gaGgAdharAd
brahmAnandaghanAbhidhO'dhita dhurAM dvyUnAH samAstriMzatam.
lilyE'dhIzvaram IzvarOrjabahulASTamyAm asau saGgavE
ghuSyannEva hi sUtrabhASyaviSayAn antEvasadbhyaH paTu..85..
—puNyazlOkamaJjarI
